p: We considered the isolation effect of different river drainages to evaluate gene flow patterns between geographic areas. We used the program Migrate [ 65] under a Bayesian framework to estimate effective population sizes (Î˜) and migration rates M between different populations from north to south in studied area. We ran four chains with thermodynamic integration and a static heating swap scheme (temperatures: 1.0, 1.5, 3.0, 10 6), sampling at every 100 th step for a total of 20 6 steps and a burn-in of 50 3 steps.
